Reviews.Title: great value
Reviews.Author: Joseph Chow
Reviews.Content: easy to outperform those entry level DSLR camera due to 2.8 f lense, easy for indoor shooting and long distance outdoor, big screen and quality to monitor.

Reviews.Title: This is no sale!
Reviews.Author: Bruce Vermeulen
Reviews.Content: The camera is great, but when the going rate in the market is $899, it's misleading to call the $1113 price a "sale."
